name: Abomibird
description:
Controls:

WASD - Move

You are scientist who has created a human bird hybrid monster, and is frantically trying to make a cure for it.

Collect the red vials and bring them to the table at the top of the lab while avoiding the abomination that's chasing you!

Try to get the highest score you can and..

KEEP MOVING!

Made in a weekend for the Mini Game Jam #99
